properties.name: hangout.jwt.secretKey.access
properties.description: Signing secret key for issued access tokens

properties.name: hangout.jwt.secretKey.refresh
properties.description: Signing secret key for issued refresh tokens

properties.name: hangout.kafka.topic.verification-mail
properties.description: Topic to send events for newly registered user's email verification

properties.name: hangout.notification-service.url
properties.description: URL of notification service it is used to check jwt token validity when verification link is clicked

properties.name: hangout.kafka.topic.activation-mail
properties.description: Topic to send events for account activation mail

properties.name: hangout.otel-collector.url
properties.description: URL of Open Telemetry collector. It is used to ship telemetry from app to telemetry backends

properties.name: hangout.log.path
properties.description: Log Directory where ogs will be permanently stored
